entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
